summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Comptroller to advertise for sale negotiable bonds of The City of Seattle in the sum of five hundred thousand (500,000) dollars, being one-half of the one million (1,000,000) dollars voted at the special election held in The City of Seattle on the 29th day of December, 1908, under and by virtue of Ordinance No. 19606, approved November 27, 1908.
